title: CB action that reduces money creation

content.question: Assuming a banking system with limited reserves, which of the following actions by the central bank reduces the ability of the banking system to create money?

choices.label: Buying government bonds on the open market

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
